testsuite.name: Scenario: Checking if the service does ping or pong when playing

testcase.name: Given I perform a "GET" to "http://localhost:7111/play" end point
testcase.classname: Scenario: Checking if the service does ping or pong when playing

testcase.name: Then the response at the json path "move" includes "Ping!" or "Pong!"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Checking if the service does ping or pong when playing

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Checking if the service does ping or pong when playing
